price: 27. Mpe ye nde abandaka kokela mpe akozongisa yango, (ya bokeli sima azongisi yango,) mpe wana ezali pete тропа ye, mpe epai naye ezuami ndakisa ya koleka kuna na likolo mpe na nsé. Mpe azali na bokasi atonda bwanya.
arabic: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِي يَبۡدَؤُاْ ٱلۡخَلۡقَ ثُمَّ يُعِيدُهُۥ وَهُوَ أَهۡوَنُ عَلَيۡهِۚ وَلَهُ ٱلۡمَثَلُ ٱلۡأَعۡلَىٰ فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: wahuwa alladhī yabda-u al-khalqa thumma yuʿīduhu wahuwa ahwanu ʿalayhi walahu al-mathalu al-aʿlā fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wahuwa al-ʿazīzu al-ḥakīmu
